Description: Dur Hospitality Co (known as: Dur) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Dur operates within the Consumer Services sector focusing on Hotels, Resorts and Cruise Lines. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Dur is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1976.
